      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(GeoPoint gp,
             MapController.AnimationType aAnimationType)
        Animates the underlying MapView that it centers the passed GeoPoint in the end. Uses: MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_DEFAULT and MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT.
        Parameters:
        gp -

      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(GeoPoint gp,
             MapController.AnimationType aAnimationType,
             int aSmoothness,
             int aDuration)
        Animates the underlying MapView that it centers the passed GeoPoint in the end.
        Parameters:
        gp - GeoPoint to be centered in the end.
        aSmoothness - steps made during animation. I.e.: MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_LOW, MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_DEFAULT, MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_HIGH
        aDuration - in Milliseconds. I.e.: MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT, MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT, MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG

      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(int aLatitudeE6,
             int aLongitudeE6,
             MapController.AnimationType aAnimationType)
        Animates the underlying MapView that it centers the passed coordinates in the end. Uses: MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_DEFAULT and MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT.
        Parameters:
        aLatitudeE6 -
        aLongitudeE6 -

      • animateTo

        public void animateTo(int aLatitudeE6,
             int aLongitudeE6,
             MapController.AnimationType aAnimationType,
             int aSmoothness,
             int aDuration)
        Animates the underlying MapView that it centers the passed coordinates in the end.
        Parameters:
        aLatitudeE6 -
        aLongitudeE6 -
        aSmoothness - steps made during animation. I.e.: MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_LOW, MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_DEFAULT, MapController.ANIMATION_SMOOTHNESS_HIGH
        aDuration - in Milliseconds. I.e.: MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_SHORT, MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_DEFAULT, MapController.ANIMATION_DURATION_LONG
